title: Fantom
summary: Fantom is a high-performance, scalable, and secure blockchain platform that aims to address the limitations of traditional blockchain networks. With its unique Lachesis consensus mechanism, Fantom offers rapid transaction speeds and robust security features. The platform is also known for its smart contract capabilities, interoperability, and a native token, FTM, which plays a pivotal role in governance and network incentivization.
excerpt: Fantom is revolutionizing the blockchain landscape with its high-speed transactions, robust security, and seamless interoperability.

title: Elys Network
summary:
Elys Network is a Cosmos Ecosystem layer-1 blockchain and decentralized exchange (DEX) with a complete suite of applications and features, including:

• Cutting edge integration for a seamless onboarding experience for non crypto-native users
• A non-custodial Automated Market Maker (AMM) style Decentralized Exchange (DEX) powered by liquidity providers and liquidity pools
• Oracle based multi-asset Index pools to increase diversification and reduce volatility
• Liquidity providers earn passive yield paid in USDC
• Leverage yield farming to maximize rewards
• Native margin trading capabilities including a universal cross collateral vault
• Native bridging capabilities to EVM chains and IBC enabled blockchains
• On/Off ramps for major fiat currencies.
excerpt: Cosmos Ecosystem DEX featuring native USDC and ETF-style index pools, seamless onboarding for non-crypto users, margin, and more.

title: Gitopia
summary: Gitopia is a platform for developers and web3 communities to collaborate on open-source projects in a decentralized and censorship-free environment. By using permanent storage through Filecoin, Arweave, and IPFS, Gitopia ensures that your code is always accessible and safe. Additionally, it offers web3-specific features such as Bounties and Proposals, as well as familiar collaboration tools like Issues and Pull-Requests. To encourage open-source development, Gitopia also offers interchain bounties and incentives through its native LORE token.

Its native token, DOT, plays a crucial role in governance, staking, and bonding, ensuring network security and evolution.

title: Algorand
summary: Algorand is a scalable, secure, and decentralized digital currency and transactions platform. It was founded by Silvio Micali, a Turing Award-winning cryptographer and MIT professor. Algorand aims to solve the three main challenges faced by blockchains today, also known as the blockchain trilemma: security, scalability, and decentralization.
excerpt: Algorand is a high-performance blockchain platform founded by MIT professor Silvio Micali aiming to solve the blockchain trilemma.

title: Ethereum
summary: Ethereum is a decentralized, open-source blockchain system that introduced the concept of smart contracts into the blockchain space. It's currently transitioning to Ethereum 2.0, which will see the platform move from a proof-of-work to a proof-of-stake consensus mechanism, promising increased speed, efficiency, and scalability.
excerpt: Ethereum is a decentralized platform that runs smart contracts, enabling applications to run as programmed without downtime, censorship, fraud, or third-party interference.

title: Cosmos Hub
summary: Cosmos is a decentralized network of independent parallel blockchains that aims to make it easy for teams to custom-build new blockchains that are highly interoperable with others that share Tendermint consensus. The Cosmos Hub Blockchain, also known as the Cosmos Network, is the main blockchain in the Cosmos ecosystem, serving as the center of the network and recording all activities on it. Several other blockchains are also part of Cosmos, and they are called "Zones," attached to the main blockchain Hub. This article will provide a comprehensive write-up about the Cosmos Hub Blockchain, covering its technical and historical facts, tokenomics, and wallets that support it.
excerpt: Interchain service provider in Cosmos and home of ATOM.

summary: Stride is a liquid staking protocol built on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem that enables users to unlock liquidity and earn yield on their staked assets. By utilizing the Cosmos SDK and Tendermint, Stride provides a secure and minimalist blockchain solution, with its primary focus on the core liquid staking protocol. The protocol has gained significant market share in the Cosmos ecosystem, with a number of integrations and support for various Cosmos Zones through the Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) protocol.

title: Akash Network
summary: The Akash Blockchain is a decentralized cloud computing platform that aims to provide an efficient, secure, and affordable alternative to traditional cloud service providers. By harnessing the power of blockchain technology, Akash enables developers to access a global network of underutilized computing resources, and users to monetize their idle infrastructure. This article covers the basics of the Akash Blockchain, its components and architecture, the Akash Token (AKT), use cases, and the platform’s advantages and challenges.
excerpt: The #1 decentralized cloud computing marketplace.

title: Regen Network
summary: Regen Network aims to establish foundational fintech infrastructure for ecological claims and data, serving as the base layer for climate-focused projects. By combining blockchain and ecology, it addresses environmental challenges and redefines societal appreciation of ecological stewardship. The platform includes Regen Ledger, which launched in April 2021, and Regen Marketplace, launched in September 2022. Nature Carbon Ton (NCT) was introduced, enabling trade on the Osmosis platform. The platform utilizes modules like Ecocredit, Marketplace, and Data to facilitate on-chain trading of ecosystem service credits. $REGEN is the native token rewarding validators and facilitating governance. The community, composed of scientists, developers, and enthusiasts, aims to have a significant climate impact with millions of credits retired and hectares of land under ecological regeneration.
excerpt: Carbon-credit based web3 economy.
